name: Blackberry Fire
description: Blackberry Fire by Purple Caper Seeds is a fuel-flavored cross of Blackberry Kush and Fire Lady. This strain was awarded 2nd place at the 2016 HempCon Cup Awards. Its terpene profile is less berry and more gas, offering sour, chemically sweetness with hints of fruit throughout. This strain’s long-lasting buzz lends itself to consumers seeking resilient physical effects.
descriptionPlain: Blackberry Fire by Purple Caper Seeds is a fuel-flavored cross of Blackberry Kush and Fire Lady. This strain was awarded 2nd place at the 2016 HempCon Cup Awards. Its terpene profile is less berry and more gas, offering sour, chemically sweetness with hints of fruit throughout. This strain’s long-lasting buzz lends itself to consumers seeking resilient physical effects.

highlightedReviews.text: This strain won an award for a reason. It looks and smells exquisite and the taste is brilliantly sweet.  It is strong in both  head and body and works fantastic for alleviating pain and muscle cramps. I am far from a doctor but with my condition this may be having a very significant  anti inflammatory affect.  I would call it ,  relaxing, as well as pain and stress relieving at the very least.
